website_summaries.verdict: Made with 100% food-grade silicone, this funnel is easy to use, it looks great in four colors, and it has above-average functionality.
pros: Flexible and easy to fold, this multipurpose funnel is environmentally friendly, and it's FDA approved
Makes it easy to transport liquid and dry powder without leaving a chemical odor
cons: They could be a bit larger as pouring a cup of dry powder can be difficult

customer_reviews.title: I should send them back.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get these. I didn't consider that dry protein powder would cling to the silicone ridges. It was impossible to get the product through the funnel. I will need to pick up a smooth hard plastic or metal one instead. I can still probably use them for liquids however I still feel cleaning the all the ridges on the inside would be more than I'm interested in doing. Otherwise. It seems like a decent solid product it just depends what you plan to use it for.
customer_reviews.author: K.M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute Little Funnels
customer_reviews.text: Somehow we had lost all of our kitchen funnels, plus I needed a funnel to load sand into weights for our patio umbrella. These were cheap and more than we needed. One is in my primary (kitchen) tool drawer and another went outside to funnel sand. The sand was pouring too slowly through the small exit, so I modified it by cutting the bottom off, opening it to about 1 inch. That was really and served my purppose. It was clean sand so I washed it off after use and will store it away. I loev that they smash down to take up no space - just what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: ggruner

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money! Reliably cheap and flimsy when you need them most.
customer_reviews.text: So thin and flimsy it's hard to effectively pour liquids through. The material is thin enough in places to be transparent. It is collapsible to lay almost flat and very lightweight which is good but distorts its shape way to much during use to be used properly. Costs almost as much as the product did in return shipping. It takes a lot for me to leave a bad review but if I could have handled them prior to purchase I wouldn't have even considered buying all 4 for 75% off. Not to mention the chemical smell will singe nose hairs even after washing throughly twice.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! I travel for work a lot and usually take my packaged protein with me and prefer to mix the protein in a water bottle for easy access but trying to get the protein into the water bottle is messy. These silicone funnels are perfect for that and the collapsible option is perfect for traveling. U also can’t beat the price. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: PinkSuedeShoes

customer_reviews.title: Works OK
customer_reviews.text: My goal was to reduce drawer space by replacing existing funnels with collapsible funnels. These work, but they do not collapse as easily as I expected. The colors are nice and the size (medium) is good, so I will be putting them in Christmas stockings as a travel item.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Moore

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: YOU CAN USE IT FOR A VERY SMALL HOLE OR A LARGE MOUTH HOLE TO FILL SUGAR,PEPPER,AND ANYTHING THAT HAS VERY SMALL HOLES TO LARGE GOOD PRODUCT FOR FAST WORK OR RESTURANT SERVICE..
customer_reviews.author: WAYNE STEVENS

customer_reviews.title: They're all the same size!?!?!?!
customer_reviews.text: Why? Silly me. The last set of funnels I got were different sizes. You know, for different sizes of bottles? I would've been happy with 1, in a more neutral color. Stocking stuffers for Xmas for 3 friends who cook.
customer_reviews.author: jeannine b.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Aromatherapy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use while making aromatherapy products. They are excellent and allow me to color code for different projects. The silicone allows the essential and carrier oils to slide right into the mixtures with little to no waste.
customer_reviews.author: S. Konner

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: These are terrific durable funnels. The fact that they collapse makes them work tremedously in my tiny kitchen. My one pointer to anyone buying is make sure you completely unfold them before using as they are not made to be used if not fully expanded
customer_reviews.author: Leedlie

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that they fold up for easy storage
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that they fold up for easy storage. These are better for liquids because the end spout is very narrow. When I pour a powder like Sweetener or Coffeemate the powder hangs on the sides and clogs the spout. If I had to purchase again, I would choose the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wendrock

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend or purchase again
customer_reviews.text: They work, but they are very flimsy and very small. Would not recommend or purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: The Unincorporated Fan

customer_reviews.title: LOUSY!
customer_reviews.text: They are so flimsy they collapse in on themselves as you use them spilling whatever you were funneling all over the place. Waste of money! Don't bother. Rolled up notebook paper probably works better than these lousy things.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great for all kinds of things
customer_reviews.text: Great for all kinds of things I use one for mixing my cleaning products and another for food the other two I haven't used yet but, these are very useful and make any prep work a breeze. I use the blue for cleaning and the orange for food.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlisa Alcala

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and store, unlike traditional plastic funnels. I love the colors, but they are all only one size. These ones were the cheapest ones I could find and they work perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jelly Bean

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Handy little funnels for all kinds of uses. Good price point and easy to store. 4 stars because the funnel opening is a little small but I can make them work for most uses.
customer_reviews.author: LAlex2015

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice for putting up in a drawer, slightly flimsy, but overall works great for mixing protein powder into water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy R. Hallford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little funnels
customer_reviews.text: Brought to add to our cellophane Christmas ball game - they look like perfect little funnels and are collapsible! I I'm ale to end up with one!
customer_reviews.author: P Bradley

customer_reviews.title: The spout is just too small.
customer_reviews.text: The spout is just too small for viscous fluids. Fits nicely in my junk drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store
customer_reviews.text: They work as they should and the best part is they barely take up any space in the drawer
customer_reviews.author: Suzy - Slice of Sweet Art

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Wish I would've found these sooner in my life. Easy to clean, dishwasher safe and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Bransford

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are flimsy and not very good quality. Plus all of the bottom openings are the same size, so this limits usage.
customer_reviews.author: Monica M. Perrone

customer_reviews.title: they work well and clean up very easily.
customer_reviews.text: These are very convenient to use, they work well and clean up very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but you must not put pressure on it or it will collapse...as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Smullis

customer_reviews.title: They're GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: They're great, and then fit in my drawer perfectly...I was able to throw my NON-Collapsible funnels away!!!
customer_reviews.author: LuxorRio

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Convenient, easy to store, multiple funnels for multiple functions, great price
customer_reviews.author: Katie K.

customer_reviews.title: Space Saving!
customer_reviews.text: They work perfect! Use them and throw them in the dishwasher, I love they’re collapsible to store in the kitchen drawer and take up no space.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Collapsible funnel has added stability benefit in addition to saving space
customer_reviews.text: I especially love how the way they expand gives them a stable ridge so it sits firmly on the lip of the bottle and I don’t have to worry about it tipping over.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Good product, durability may be an issue. It started to get holes quickly
customer_reviews.author: Delon Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even last a day before ripping. I guess thats why there’s 4 to a pack. Made very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Fun  Funnels
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Easy to store and I can use different ones for different things.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great collapsible funnels, exactly what I had in mind, easy to store in a drawer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work great for fluids
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Work great for fluids. Powder seems to get stuck in the grooves, but not bad. I enjoy using them.
customer_reviews.author: hugo

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: This product did what it was supposed to and I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen E. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: I had no idea what I was missing!
customer_reviews.text: These are infinitely useful! Silicone is so easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used several times within receipt and so so satisfied! Love the colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Works great for helping to fill bottles of kombucha!
customer_reviews.text: I use these to bottle kombucha. They work well, but since these are very flexible, smooth silicone, be careful that they don't form a seal with the mouth of the bottle you're filling. That prevents the liquid from emptying into the bottle, and can lead to spills. Either hold the funnel so there is an air gap, or maybe place a toothpick or something between the funnel and the mouth of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: dibbs

customer_reviews.title: Handy Dandy
customer_reviews.text: I'm the type to over pack and pack items that seem "unnecessary" that is until they are necessary. I bought this funnel for fun, thinking I may use it while traveling and finally a year later the time came when I had to pout something from a big bottle into a smaller one and this bad boy did the trick. Easy to clean and dry after use. No funky smell.
customer_reviews.author: BornLove

customer_reviews.title: Funnels Rip
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bummed. One of the funnels came ripped at the seam where it folds to collapse and another ripped when opened to use the first time. Other one is working fine but I've only used it once.
customer_reviews.author: MrFixItDIY

customer_reviews.title: Funnels, easy storage
customer_reviews.text: Just cut the bottom to get the right hole size. Particularly needed one for filling bag for carbon for tank, but thought a few extra would be good for refilling my chalk sock for climbing and other uses
customer_reviews.author: Oceanshrks

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I have had them a short time with light use and one has already torn in two places.
customer_reviews.author: MCD

customer_reviews.title: These funny little things kind of remind me of the funnels ...
customer_reviews.text: These funny little things kind of remind me of the funnels you need for car repairs and what not, the colors more so than anything. Great functional funnels that I needed very badly to add my supplements to my water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Eun♡

customer_reviews.title: Bottle funnel
customer_reviews.text: Used in my bar for moving liquids into liquor bottles. Easy to clean and store. Stand up right on their own in the bottle. Can change how quickly it pours by squeezing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small and slow
customer_reviews.text: These are probably great for someone else. They are very small funnels and not great for my use. The hole in the bottom seems small even for the funnel size? Again this might be good for another but I was wanting something with a better flow rate and not a slow trickle.
customer_reviews.author: B.W.

customer_reviews.title: I wished the funnel hole on the bottom was a big bigger since it has a hard time funneling fine powders. I wouldn't recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Does an OK job. I wished the funnel hole on the bottom was a big bigger since it has a hard time funneling fine powders. I wouldn't recommend this product, especially if you got it for protein powders and or other fine powder products.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Gave to Goodwill
customer_reviews.text: Way too flexible to be able to add much liquid all at once. I guess if you were in a camper or tiny house and needed to really save space, one of these would be better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Glo S.

customer_reviews.title: Would have been better value without the 50% split rate
customer_reviews.text: Two out of four finals came with cracks/splits in the fold lines. Otherwise they would’ve rated four stars for lightweight and easy to pack.
customer_reviews.author: Dntpokedbear

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: I've found them equally useful for wet or dry use and they take up so little space in my kitchen. I've run a couple through the dishwasher several times and they still seem like the new ones. Very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: collapsible ... a "better mousetrap" for sure
customer_reviews.text: fantastic product. stands up and functions perfectly. convenience is excellent due to the collapsibility. good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: footballrn

customer_reviews.title: Good funnels, very sleek and compact
customer_reviews.text: Good funnels, very sleek and compact. Only comes in one size. It would have been nice to have different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: works great.
customer_reviews.text: work good.. save space in the drawer. came on time. would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact enough (and collapsable) for storage and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Compact enough (and collapsable) for storage and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Linger

customer_reviews.title: Love these funnel
customer_reviews.text: Love these funnel! They don't take up a lot of space and I can make them smaller to fill smaller bottles.
customer_reviews.author: jsclady

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described...4 pack of silicon collapsible funnels. Easy to clean and they fit in the drawer without the need to play tetris with them,
customer_reviews.author: Harbau

customer_reviews.title: like adding some water to a bottle but heavy liquids ...
customer_reviews.text: They are very flimsy and thin. I kept them because they do work for what little things I use for them for, like adding some water to a bottle but heavy liquids or solids I don’t think would do well.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I'm in the process of replacing all of my kitchen stuff to silicone - well as much as possible anyway
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Sowby

customer_reviews.title: Collapsible so storage is easy
customer_reviews.text: These funnels work well and I love that they collapse for storage.
customer_reviews.author: MelodyC

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: used them the first time I brought them home. Very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to keep track of what's used for which sort of liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it is collapsible for easy storage a great product
customer_reviews.author: karen beall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! For the storage solutions alone it's worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emile Cole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I love that they take up so little room when they are collapsed.
customer_reviews.author: M Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: They work great, hold up to use are dishwasher safe and collapsible for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Bowles

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact they collapse for storage
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact they collapse for storage. Powdered substance has a difficult time running smoothly through the funnel without getting stuck.
customer_reviews.author: lisa m.

product_meta.title: Hibery Kitchen Funnel, 4 Pcs Food Funnel Set, Flexible & Foldable Silicone Funnel for Water Bottle Liquid Powder Transfer
